channel.title: How do i make a shop (317)
channel.description:
Guys help i need to know how to make a shop cos my shopmaker by jaywalker gives me errors on my compiler :| :| :( :(
Ty i advance!

item.title: How do i make a shop (317)
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

[quote=“HiddenPker, post:4, topic:286650”][quote author=Mod Skill09 link=topic=379079.msg2851111#msg2851111 date=1246549711]
There is a few steps to adding shops:
1)Add an NPC
2)Add the shop items in shops.cfg
3) Add this code to client.java:

else if (NPCID == NPC ID) { // Shop Name
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = SHOP ID; //
}
Replace NPC ID with the ID of your Shop’s NPC, and SHOP ID with the ID of your shop in shops.cfg

GL
[/quote]

Where would you add the shop bit in client.java. after what?[/quote]

Go into your client.java, i’m sure your server has a few shops. Search wanneshop and add it around there.
Use the other shops under it as a guideline.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a shop (317)

item.title: How do i make a shop (317)
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Skill09 Mod Skill09
item.description:
@Mod_Skill09 wrote:

There is a few steps to adding shops:
1)Add an NPC
2)Add the shop items in shops.cfg
3) Add this code to client.java:

else if (NPCID == NPC ID) { // Shop Name
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = SHOP ID; //
}
Replace NPC ID with the ID of your Shop’s NPC, and SHOP ID with the ID of your shop in shops.cfg

GL
